cv.title:
Mathieu Fortune
Front/UI Developer
cv.desc:
4+ years Front/UI Developer looking for new challenges at the international.
Send me an email at pro.mathieu.fortune@gmail.com

about.title: About
about.desc: I'm a French Front/UI Developer with 4+ years of experience, looking for new challenges at the international. Identify, search and resolve human problems by designing and developing products is a passion I'm living every day. Constantly learning and experiencing new things.

experiences.title: UI Developer & UX/UI Designer
experiences.name: 1001Pharmacies.com
experiences.desc: Currently working on a user centric redesign of 1001Pharmacies's e-commerce website as UI Developper and also Ux/UI Designer
experiences.skills: HTML5, CSS3, Sass, ITCSS, Sketch, Javascript, Symfony 2, Design Thinking, Scrum, Lean UX, Git, Webpack

experiences.title: UI Developer
experiences.name: 1001Pharmacies.com
experiences.desc: In charge of UI Development of 1001Pharmacies.com's front applications such as responsive newsletters and landings. Also on e-commerce website maintenance.
experiences.skills: HTML5, CSS3, Less, Javascript, Fundation, Bootstrap, Photoshop, Symfony 2, Git, Gulp

experiences.title: Front-end Developer
experiences.name: Publika
experiences.desc: Front-end Development of client's websites in various industries (e-commerce, corporate, landings, social network, ...) and differents technos (CMS, Custom MVC framework, ...)
experiences.skills: HTML5, CSS3, Less, jQuery, Bootstrap, Adobe CC, MVC, SQL, PHP, Git

i_have: Successful experience in e-commerce start-up environment
High self-motivation in working individually and closely with others
Solving key design problems through ideation
Expertise in HTML and CSS languages
Analyze user testing, measuring and rebuilding
Strong sense of design theory and typography
Experience in responsive web design, cross-platform compatible coding techniques and troubleshooting
Positive attitude with a pragmatic and hedonic view

trainings.desc: Several Workshops around Lean Startup and Running Lean books. How to lead problems interviews, lean canvas, lean approach of things

projects.title: Product Catalog redesign project
projects.description: This project intended to re-design and develop the catalog (search, find and buy a product) of 1001pharmacies e-commerce website
projects.results: This project is in work in progress
list: Assets treatment with Webpack and PostCss
LEAN UX approach and Scrum methods

projects.title: Checkout process redesign project
projects.description: This project intended to re-design and develop the checkout process (cart, delivery, payment of an order) of 1001pharmacies e-commerce website
projects.results: +5% increase on the cart transformation rate. Significantly improve user experience trough the entire checkout process
list: LEAN UX approach and Scrum methods

projects.title: Checkout's UX experiments
projects.description: In order to improve checkout process of 1001pharmacies.com, UX experiments has been performed to test and better understand users behavior
projects.results: With user testing feedbacks, I improved team's workflow and democratized user testing methods knowledge in the company
list: Perform A/B tests and set up UX metrics

projects.title: UX designer tasks on various projects
projects.description: As I was the UX designer referent at 1001pharmacies.com, I helped product owners in their missions
list: Make task flows, uses cases and scenarios
Conduct ux methods like Visual Studio, Focus Group to improve ideation process

projects.title: i18n Ready project
projects.description: In order to prepare 1001pharmacies's website to be i18n ready, I worked on twig templates and translation files on Symfony 2. I also use this project to move the pages responsive ready
projects.results: My work on the responsive ready optimization increase by +20% the mobile traffic part on the website. Loading time of these pages was 1.5 time faster than before moving them
list: Develop an i18n ready functionnality on Symfony 2
Adapt pages to be mobile ready with Responsive Web Design technics

projects.title: Marketing tools
projects.description: To help marketing actions, I was led to design and develop responsive ready newsletters and landing pages
projects.results: With these new tools, marketing team's gain in conversion rate and set up time for each campaign. I also helped to improve front-end environment knowledge of co-workers
list: Design and develop responsive ready newsletter's templates (Ink framework from Fundation)
Design and develop auto-generated responsive ready landings with Jekyll

projects.title: Events and conferences
projects.description: I enjoy sharing knowledge with people and participate in community activities
list: Provide lightning talks about popularize dev concepts for the rest of company
Participate and animate UX workshop during MeetUp

projects.title: Side projects
projects.description: Several side projects to test new technologies for work and also for fun :)
list: Co-develop 'career' website of the company in Meteor + Angular2
Co-develop a front assets bootstrapping tool with Gulp
Design and develop my personal website with Jekyll and Sass
